How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?

chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!

cross the river using thee log , at the tiger island cross the river using the log. Walk between the parrot and the elephant . Cross the river using the rocks. You will see a frog. Use the alligator to go back to the elephant island and use the rocks to cross the river. You will see a giraffe , use the log to cross the river . Pass the snake and you will find the treasure chest.

alright, so i've used the log and crossed over to the tiger island, then jumped on another log to another area. snuck between the parrot and the elephant alright, thank you. i crossed the river again with the rocks, now i can see the frog, yup

Caminar sobre el cocodrilo fue aterrador, pero logró regresar sano y salvo a la isla de los elefantes y usó las rocas para cruzar de regreso. La jirafa se ve bien, cruzó otro río. Pasó la serpiente y – ¡oh, oye! ¡Encontré el tesoro! ¡Lo logramos, gracias! *finalizado*

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
si
great! so, see the wooden bench to your left? head there, passing under it and cross the trail to the florist stand
¡pero para! ¡no lo alcances! en su lugar, gire bruscamente a la izquierda, vuelva a cruzar el sendero y regrese hacia el perro. ¿entiendo?
si
fantastic! now just cross over the path south from the dog
you'll find another cute white dog by a picnic. you see it?
got it!
awesome! now, keep going south, stepping over the picnic mat
¡Tómate un momento para admirar el plato de bayas al pasar!
ok
great! now, you see a wooden branch crossing a river north, right? cross it
got it
nice! now, you see a green bush? don't touch it! instead, go around it from the right
done
¡buen trabajo! Ahora ves ese puesto de floristería, ¿verdad? haz tu camino hacia él
listo!
bingo! now, turn to your left, go under the stand and scoot toward the massive bridge
done
great job! now you see the bicycle riders, right? pass them towards the west
done
¡excelente! ¿Ves a esos encantadores ancianos de allí? Justo después del puente, dirígete hacia ellos, ¡pero no interrumpas su lectura del periódico!
listo
perfect! now, go south just a few steps between the elderly folks and another branch
you should see a bush by the end of the branch
got it
¡impresionante! ahora, ve hacia el este entre la rama y el arbusto.
done
alright! now, keep going east a little
and. you see that adorable little brown deer? there's the finish line! great navigating!

chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
hola walk south until you see a dog
head east between the grill and the fire ten cuidado do not burn yourself
head sout east and you will see a car
go back to the trail were you found the fire and head south
you will see a telescope and a bush , cross between and head west
go north on the rocks and you will find the cabin.!!!

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
si
great! ok, first, stroll southwest under the first palm tree, then gear right past the second. make a sharp left before tree number three
diríjase al sur. Lo estás haciendo genial
lisdto
awesome! now, you'll see a cute brown puppy on your left
walk by its left, then turn slightly to the left and right again heading south. keep going!
ready
cool! now, you'll notice a big rock on your west and a smaller one on the east
Vaya directamente entre ellos hacia el océano. ¿Ya sientes la brisa?
fresco el mar, listo
fantastic! now get ready to meet our little red friend
yes, that crab! turn right and stroll westward alongside the big rock. it's a water walk now, enjoy the waves!
what a cutie! done
ha! now, hug the shoreline until you see a medium rock
Después de eso, ¡prepárate para un encuentro con un tiburón! No te preocupes, son más amigables de lo que parecen.
scary!!! done
great job! now, dart right, and head back to the dry land
got it
terrific! now, pass between our medium buddy rock and a blue-yellow-white ball and keep heading north
¡lo estás matando!
got it
nice! now just swerve a tiny bit to your left and head northwest
see a red tent and a big speaker? pass right between them. keep it up!
done
¡Atta chico! Ahora, prepárate para un pequeño desvío: sigue un arco alrededor de la tienda y luego continúa hacia el sur.
listo
awesome! keep going until you see the sea
but stay on land and turn right towards a red kayak, don't get too sandy!
got it
good job! make a 90 degrees turn to your right, travel along the kayak heading north now
¡casi llegamos!
done
bravo! just take a few more steps until you come across a small green bush! you've reached the final spot
well done my friend!

general_survey.answer: yes, before my family moved to USA
general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
On a day-to-day basis, how likely are you to have a conversation using both your first and second languages?
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At work
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: Make me feel comfortable and able to communicate in both languages .
general_survey.question: What do you think when others mix languages in conversation? Please explain:
Any final comments about your language background?
